constituent: mistake, say, words, keitai, mouth, give, mouth, chair, tool, animal legs, mouth2
koohiiStory1: You must give words of apology when you make a mistake.
koohiiStory2: It is a rookie mistake to believe the words when your sweetie says "You don´t have to give me anything for my birthday." Trust me, your sweetie wants something, something shiny, and if you disappoint, you will suffer.
words: to deceive, to falsify, to misrepresent
